name: Fork Patrol
description:
A game similar to Moon Patrol (1982), made with Raylib!

Fork Patrol is about jumping over obstacles and shooting bullets at enemies in the sky.
This prototype was made in a fork of another developer's repository. Visit the Original Author!

● Controls: 
Mouse and [Left Click] to navigate the Menus.
[A] and [D] to Move as Player 1.
[W] to Jump as Player 1.
[S] to Shoot as Player 1.
The equivalent but with the Arrow Keys for Player 2.

● Credits: Special Thanks to: 
- Jose Altamirano, for the Original Source Code.
- Ray, for the Raylib library.
- knik1985, for the Jeep and Drone sprites.
- Chiptone, for the sound effects.
